root.name: pixelWidth
root.description: This variable stores the pixel width of the display window. If the screen is a high resolution display like a Mac Retina or Windows High-DPI display and pixelDensity(2) is included in the code after size(), this value will be twice as large as the dimensions of the sketch defined in size(). For example if size(600, 400) is defined for a program, the pixelWidth value will be 1200 pixels.
